Package ohos.agp.components

Class Slider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component
      • ohos.agp.components.ProgressBar
        • ohos.agp.components.AbsSlider
          • ohos.agp.components.Slider

  • public class Slider
extends AbsSlider
    Provides a progress component that allows for dragging operations on the screen.

    You can change the progress of an event, for example, to fast-forward music playback. If the Slider is used to indicate the completion state of a task, the slider cannot be dragged on the screen.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Detail

      • mValueChangedListener

        protected Slider.ValueChangedListener mValueChangedListener
        Indicates a listener to receive notifications of progress level changes.

        ValueChangedListener stores the slider change listener and provides the callback to process change events of the slider.

    • Method Detail

      • setValueChangedListener

        public void setValueChangedListener​(Slider.ValueChangedListener listener)
        Sets a listener to listen for change events of a slider.

        For example, the listener listens for the event when touching the slider or dragging it to change the current progress level.

        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener.
        See Also:
        Slider.ValueChangedListener

      • getValueChangedListener

        public Slider.ValueChangedListener getValueChangedListener​()
        Obtains the the listener for monitoring change events of this Slider.
        Returns:
        Returns the listener.
        Since:
        4

      • setIncreaseButton

        public void setIncreaseButton​(Element element,
                              Component.ClickedListener listener)
        Sets an increase button for this slider.

        The increase button is located on the top of a vertical slider or on the right of a horizontal slider.

        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the element object of the increase button.
        listener - Indicates the increase button listener. If this parameter is null, the default increase button listener will be used.
        Since:
        3

      • setIncreaseButtonElement

        Parameters:
        element - Indicates the Element object for the increase button.
        Since:
        4

        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener to set. If this parameter is null, the default listener is used for the increase button.
        Since:

      • setAdjustButtons

        public void setAdjustButtons​(Element increaseElement,
                             Component.ClickedListener increaseListener,
                             Element decreaseElement,
                             Component.ClickedListener decreaseListener)
        Sets increase and decrease buttons for this Slider.

        The increase button is located at the top of a vertical slider or on the right of a horizontal slider; the decrease button is located at the bottom of a vertical slider or on the left side of a horizontal slider.

        Parameters:
        increaseElement - Indicates the Element object for the increase button.
        increaseListener - Indicates the listener for the increase button. If this parameter is null, the default listener is used for the increase button.
        decreaseElement - Indicates the Element object for the decrease button.
        decreaseListener - Indicates the listener for the decrease button. If this parameter is null, the default listener is used for the decrease button.
        Since:
        4

      • getAdjustButtonsElements

        public Element[] getAdjustButtonsElements​()
        Obtains the Element objects of all increase and decrease buttons.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Element objects.
        Since:
        4
